thread.title: Arrest in Colchester quick stop stickup

author: WCAX News
title: Arrest in Colchester quick stop stickup
text:
COLCHESTER, Vt. - Colchester police made an arrest Tuesday morning in connection with a convenience store stickup.
Police say after releasing surveillance photos from the robbery at the Simon's store on College Parkway Sunday, several people identified the suspect as Dylan Bowler, 26, of Jericho. He was taken into custody after agreeing to meet with investigators Tuesday morning.
Related Story:
Colchester convenience store robbed
